source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
Support MPW in 
ensuring 100% 
registration of 
pregnancies within 
catchment area in first 
trimester
 ∙ Support MPW in 
ensuring 100% 
complete ANC for all 
pregnant women in 
catchment area
 ∙ Mentor ASHAs, AWW 
and MPWs for providing 
maternal health services
 ∙ Supportive supervision 
visits to the VHSNDs/
villages in the catchment 
area to ensure optimum 
coverage of maternal 
health services
 ∙ Ensure availability of 
drugs, diagnostics, 
consumables and 
equipment essential 
for providi
